sources.autograph: Washington, Library of Congress, 1804. Opera 64. Quartetto secondo (for reference number, title and comment, see No. 248)

entries.notes: The quarter was never completed. Unpublished.

sources.autograph: Washington, Library of Congress, M452. A2. B68. Op. 54. Opera 54

entries.notes: Arrangement by Boccherini himself? No reference in Boccherini's autograph catalogue. For comment as to authenticity, see below. Arrangement of the whole of the trio in D Major Op. 54 no. 1 (of 1796) (No. 113).
